home.pitch: The platform for your customized RPG games
home.step1: Create your account and discover many unique universes
home.step2: Create your own RPG with your universe and your rules
home.step3: Share your RPG with your friends and other enthusiasts
home.fonc1: Create your own RPG with your theme, your rules, and your ideas
home.fonc2: Create your character sheets easily and quickly
home.fonc3: Share your universe easily and discover multiple unique RPGs
home.fonc4: Play easily with your friends by having your sheets always available
